successes.title: Electric Objects: A Computer Made for Art
successes.description: A framed high-definition screen and integrated computer that hangs on your wall and brings art from the Internet into your home.

Pledges.description: Follow along through the production process and help spread the word! Receive a personal thank you from the Electric Objects Team. Every dollar helps!
Get a limited edition Electric Objects T-shirt with artwork from the Internet, and our undying respect and admiration. Free U.S. Shipping.  [Image Below]

Choose a White or Black EO1. Includes wall mounting kit and access to our web and mobile applications, featuring original artwork and collections from museums, libraries, and other partner organizations. Free U.S. Shipping. [Retail: $499]

Be the first to own EO1 four months before everyone else. Choose a White or Black EO1. Includes wall mounting kit and access to our web and mobile applications, featuring original artwork and collections from museums, libraries, and other partner organizations.
Free U.S. Shipping.
